desc.en: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部正在尋找愛麗絲的行蹤。藉由乃愛和優香的協助後，調查出愛麗絲已經前往莉央創造的要塞都市「埃裡都」了。在潛入埃裡都之前，寧瑠提出一項作戰方案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由诺亚和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，尼禄提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。

desc.en: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.jp: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.thai: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.ko: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人聯絡了優香等人，優香聽聞愛麗絲被帶走一事大為驚訝。老師向研討會請求幫助，希望能確認愛麗絲的具體所在地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。
desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.
desc.jp: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.
desc.thai: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.
desc.ko: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.
desc.zh_tw: 不出老師所料，優香和乃愛找到了被刻意隱藏和刪除的財務記錄，就連優香都對此表示驚歎。在恢復並追蹤去向後，優香找到了一個叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，據稱正是會長所建。優香將座標傳送給眾人，並表示自己所處的立場不好給予更多協助後匆匆離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 不出老师所料，优香和诺亚找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.thai: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.ko: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部認為都市的建造原料應該是從千年本地發出，因而只要找到前往都市的無人運送車，將他們置換成貨物裝進去即可。老師好奇工程部為何會願意參與此事，詠葉則表示會長帶走愛麗絲的“光之劍”本身已屬越權，某種意義上屬於對工程部宣戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，咏叶则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，咏叶则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。

desc.en: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.jp: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.

desc.zh_tw: 解決了潛入問題，戰鬥和救援行動又重新擺上檯面來。綠和柚子簡單講述了時當時的情況，表示就像“作弊玩家”一樣快和敏捷。寧瑠罕見地提出了作戰計劃，表示既然主要目標就是將愛麗絲救出，那麼由她們去吸引火力，遊戲開發部和工程部趁機救出即可。貝里塔斯則表示會在後方提供通訊支援。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。尼禄罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。贝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。宁瑠罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。贝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。宁瑠罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。贝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部和老師正在苦思要加入遊戲新作的創意。桃井和綠的意見發生分歧，兩人為了做出最後的結論，於是決定使用遊戲開發部代代相傳的方式決勝負。另一方面，柚子為了讓愛麗絲能獲得特別的靈感，於是給了她任務。苦思該如何執行任務的愛麗絲決定先和老師一起去學園冒險。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。

desc.en: The Game Development Club started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.jp: The Game Development Club started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.thai: The Game Development Club started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.ko: The Game Development Club started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部眾人開始討論遊戲的具體形式。從地牢的機制到武器裝備，以及美術和表現形式之類。因為桃井過於強調美術而又常常易稿，許多美術資源都被廢棄，引來妹妹綠的非常不滿。兩人強迫老師做出一個選擇。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为桃井过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹绿的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为桃井过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹绿的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为桃井过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹绿的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Yuzu stopped the twins and said that it should be decided by "that" - playing a game - a tradition in the club. While the two were playing games, Yuzu assigned Aris the task of going outside for a walk, in the hope of some inspirations.
desc.jp: Yuzu stopped the twins and said that it should be decided by "that" - playing a game - a tradition in the club. While the two were playing games, Yuzu assigned Aris the task of going outside for a walk, in the hope of some inspirations.

desc.ko: Yuzu stopped the twins and said that it should be decided by "that" - playing a game - a tradition in the club. While the two were playing games, Yuzu assigned Aris the task of going outside for a walk, in the hope of some inspirations.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子及時攔下了兩人，表示要用社團的“那個”——進行遊戲對局——來決定。就在兩人打遊戲的時候，柚子分配給了愛麗絲去外邊轉幾圈的任務，希望能夠由此獲得一些靈感。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子及时拦下了两人，表示要用社团的“那个”——进行游戏对局——来决定。就在两人打游戏的时候，柚子分配给了爱丽丝去外边转几圈的任务，希望能够由此获得一些灵感。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子及时拦下了两人，表示要用社团的“那个”——进行游戏对局——来决定。就在两人打游戏的时候，柚子分配给了爱丽丝去外边转几圈的任务，希望能够由此获得一些灵感。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子及时拦下了两人，表示要用社团的“那个”——进行游戏对局——来决定。就在两人打游戏的时候，柚子分配给了爱丽丝去外边转几圈的任务，希望能够由此获得一些灵感。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Aris and Sensei came to the campus. Aris said that both she and Sensei were "Beginner Heros", due to a small argument in which Momoi tries to put BOSSes right at the beginning of the game and was rejected. Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.
desc.jp: Aris and Sensei came to the campus. Aris said that both she and Sensei were "Beginner Heros", due to a small argument in which Momoi tries to put BOSSes right at the beginning of the game and was rejected. Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.

Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲與老師來到了千年校園。愛麗絲說自己和老師都是“見習勇者”，而這源於桃井試圖在新手村外放BOSS而被否決一事。愛麗絲對如何進行柚子的任務很苦惱，而老師則建議愛麗絲先前進再說。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝与老师来到了千年校园。爱丽丝说自己和老师都是“见习勇者”，而这源于桃井试图在新手村外放BOSS而被否决一事。爱丽丝对如何进行柚子的任务很苦恼，而老师则建议爱丽丝先前进再说。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝与老师来到了千年校园。爱丽丝说自己和老师都是“见习勇者”，而这源于桃井试图在新手村外放BOSS而被否决一事。爱丽丝对如何进行柚子的任务很苦恼，而老师则建议爱丽丝先前进再说。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝与老师来到了千年校园。爱丽丝说自己和老师都是“见习勇者”，而这源于桃井试图在新手村外放BOSS而被否决一事。爱丽丝对如何进行柚子的任务很苦恼，而老师则建议爱丽丝先前进再说。

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival opens with Hanako and Ayane's recital of the festival's oath.
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival opens with Hanako and Ayane's recital of the festival's oath.
desc.thai: The Kivotos Halo Festival opens with Hanako and Ayane's recital of the festival's oath.
desc.ko: The Kivotos Halo Festival opens with Hanako and Ayane's recital of the festival's oath.
desc.zh_tw: 以花子和綾音的宣示為始，奇普托斯晄輪大祭開幕。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 以花子和绫音的宣示为始，奇普托斯晄轮大祭开幕。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 以花子和绫音的宣示为始，奇普托斯晄轮大祭开幕。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 以花子和绫音的宣示为始，奇普托斯晄轮大祭开幕。

desc.en: Two students from the Kronos School's News Club introduced everyone watching the live stream about the "Kivotos Halo Festival" hosted by the Millennium Science School. The two highlighted that Sensei from Schale participated in the arrangement of this sports meeting.
desc.jp: Two students from the Kronos School's News Club introduced everyone watching the live stream about the "Kivotos Halo Festival" hosted by the Millennium Science School. The two highlighted that Sensei from Schale participated in the arrangement of this sports meeting.
desc.thai: Two students from the Kronos School's News Club introduced everyone watching the live stream about the "Kivotos Halo Festival" hosted by the Millennium Science School. The two highlighted that Sensei from Schale participated in the arrangement of this sports meeting.
desc.ko: Two students from the Kronos School's News Club introduced everyone watching the live stream about the "Kivotos Halo Festival" hosted by the Millennium Science School. The two highlighted that Sensei from Schale participated in the arrangement of this sports meeting.
desc.zh_tw: 來自克洛里斯新聞部的兩位學生為正在觀看直播的觀眾介紹了此次由千年科學學院主辦的“晄輪大祭”運動會。在報道中，兩人重點提到了夏萊的老師參與了大運動會的比賽安排。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 来自克洛里斯新闻部的两位学生为正在观看直播的观众介绍了此次由千年科学学院主办的“晄轮大祭”运动会。在报道中，两人重点提到了夏莱的老师参与了大运动会的比赛安排。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 来自克洛里斯新闻部的两位学生为正在观看直播的观众介绍了此次由千年科学学院主办的“晄轮大祭”运动会。在报道中，两人重点提到了夏莱的老师参与了大运动会的比赛安排。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 来自克洛里斯新闻部的两位学生为正在观看直播的观众介绍了此次由千年科学学院主办的“晄轮大祭”运动会。在报道中，两人重点提到了夏莱的老师参与了大运动会的比赛安排。

desc.en: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.jp: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.thai: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.ko: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.zh_tw: 麻衣是一位隸屬於克洛盧斯新聞部的部員，負責基沃託斯多數新聞事件的報導工作，在部分劇情中與詩音一起出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 麻衣是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作，在部分剧情中与诗音一起出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 麻衣是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作，在部分剧情中与诗音一起出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 麻衣是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作，在部分剧情中与诗音一起出现。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.thai: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.ko: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_tw: 詩音是一位隸屬於克洛盧斯新聞部的部員，負責基沃託斯多數新聞事件的報導工作。其有時與麻衣一起出場，在劇情中主要負責新聞實況的解說員，一些新聞大螢幕上常常能看見她充滿激情地播報著動態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: Okusora Ayane from Abydos High School and Urawa Hanako from Trinity General School, two students made a vow altogether. During the process however, Hanako started talking about the dirty words. The signal was cut immediately.
desc.jp: Okusora Ayane from Abydos High School and Urawa Hanako from Trinity General School, two students made a vow altogether. During the process however, Hanako started talking about the dirty words. The signal was cut immediately.
desc.thai: Okusora Ayane from Abydos High School and Urawa Hanako from Trinity General School, two students made a vow altogether. During the process however, Hanako started talking about the dirty words. The signal was cut immediately.
desc.ko: Okusora Ayane from Abydos High School and Urawa Hanako from Trinity General School, two students made a vow altogether. During the process however, Hanako started talking about the dirty words. The signal was cut immediately.
desc.zh_tw: 阿拜多斯高中的“奧空綾音”與三一綜合學院的“浦和花子”兩位學生共同發表了選手宣誓。在宣誓過程中，花子突然就開了黃腔，直播訊號隨即被切斷。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿拜多斯高中的“奥空绫音”与三一综合学院的“浦和花子”两位学生共同发表了选手宣誓。在宣誓过程中，花子突然就开了黄腔，直播信号随即被切断。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阿拜多斯高中的“奥空绫音”与三一综合学院的“浦和花子”两位学生共同发表了选手宣誓。在宣誓过程中，花子突然就开了黄腔，直播信号随即被切断。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阿拜多斯高中的“奥空绫音”与三一综合学院的“浦和花子”两位学生共同发表了选手宣誓。在宣誓过程中，花子突然就开了黄腔，直播信号随即被切断。

school.jp: トリニティ総合学園

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.thai: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.ko: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。
desc.zh_tw: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: Back at the studio, though surprised by Hanako's remarks, Mai and Shinon still tried to seize the chance of exclusive coverage, which was denied right away.
desc.jp: Back at the studio, though surprised by Hanako's remarks, Mai and Shinon still tried to seize the chance of exclusive coverage, which was denied right away.
desc.thai: Back at the studio, though surprised by Hanako's remarks, Mai and Shinon still tried to seize the chance of exclusive coverage, which was denied right away.
desc.ko: Back at the studio, though surprised by Hanako's remarks, Mai and Shinon still tried to seize the chance of exclusive coverage, which was denied right away.
desc.zh_tw: 畫面轉回到演播室，麻衣和詩音兩人雖對花子的言論感到震驚，但仍然還是想取得獨家報道的機會，不過並未如願。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 画面转回到演播室，麻衣和诗音两人虽对花子的言论感到震惊，但仍然还是想取得独家报道的机会，不过并未如愿。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 画面转回到演播室，麻衣和诗音两人虽对花子的言论感到震惊，但仍然还是想取得独家报道的机会，不过并未如愿。

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.thai: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.ko: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_tw: 奇普托斯運動大會「晄輪大祭」終於開始了。各個學園齊聚一堂，在相互競爭的慶典背後，暗藏著波濤洶湧……究竟，勝利女神會向哪個學園露出微笑呢？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 奇普托斯运动大会“晄轮大祭”终于开始了。各个学园齐集一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 奇普托斯运动大会“晄轮大祭”终于开始了。各个学园齐集一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

name.en: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.jp: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.thai: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.ko: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.zh_tw: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄輪大祭～
name.zh_cn_jp: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～
